attributes.action: make the enviroment agency rethink about the current rod licence scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present rod licences are sold per 2 rods at a cost of £22 per licence ,as most specimen anglers tend to use 3 rods each they still have to pay for 2 licences at a cost of £44 ,match anglers only tend to use 1 rod at a time ,in this case you are paying £11 extra for a rod which is not being used , therefore the goverment should urge the EA to rethink and charge the rod licences per rod
